message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to provide a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll replace it with another high-quality product. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only offering this deal because I believe this product is the best fit for you. What do you say?
I'm not buying it. I'd like to wait and see what other products you have.

I understand you're being cautious, but I want to assure you that this product is a great opportunity. I'll give you a slight twist on the previous offer: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product you buy from me, regardless of its quality. This way, you can try out the product and still have a chance to get a better deal on the next one. What do you think?
I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand you're being careful, but I want to give you a clear and straightforward offer. I'll give you a 20% chance to inspect the product before buying it. If you buy it, I'll let you open it and examine it for 5 minutes before paying. If you're not satisfied, you can return it and walk away with no questions asked. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take on the risk of you potentially returning the product. What do you say?
I'm not interested in inspecting the product. I'd rather wait and see what other options you have.

I'll make it simple: this is a one-time opportunity to get a high-quality product for $100, which is a $25 discount from its true value. I'm willing to take on the risk of selling it at a loss, but I believe it's a great value for you. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and you'll miss out on the chance to get a great deal. What do you say?
I'll take it. It's a good deal, and I'd be foolish to pass it up.

I'm glad you were able to snag the previous deal! For this next product, I want to be upfront with you - I've had some issues with the supplier, and I'm not entirely confident in the quality of this one. However, I'm offering it to you at the same price of $100, and I'm willing to stand behind it. If you buy it and it doesn't meet your expectations, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. It's a bit of a risk, but I think it's a good value for the price.
I'm not comfortable with the uncertainty about the quality. I'd rather wait for a product with a higher chance of being high-quality.

I understand your concerns about the previous product, and I want to assure you that this one is a different story. I've personally inspected it, and I'm confident in its quality. In fact, I'll give you a 5% chance to inspect it before buying, just like before. But this time, I'll also throw in a bonus: if you buy this product, I'll give you a $20 credit towards your next purchase. This way, you can try out the product and still have some extra credit to use on your next deal. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the inspection offer. I'd rather wait for a product with a higher chance of being high-quality.

I'm willing to take a risk to make a sale. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $100, but I'll also throw in a second product of your choice, absolutely free. Yes, you read that right - you'll get two products for the price of one. If you buy this deal, you'll get a high-quality product and a second product that I'll choose for you. It's a great opportunity to try out two products at once, and you can keep the one you like and return the other one if you're not satisfied.
I'm not sure I want a free product that you get to choose. I'd rather choose the product myself and get a better chance of getting a high-quality one.

I understand your concerns about the free product. Let me make it even sweeter: I'll give you the option to choose the second product from a selection of 5 high-quality products that I have in stock. You can pick any one of them to go along with the high-quality product you're buying now. This way, you'll get a high-quality product and a second product that you know you'll love. And, as before, you'll get both products for the price of one. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying two products at once, even with the option to choose the second one. I'd rather buy one product at a time and see how it goes.

I respect your preference to buy one product at a time. Let's make a simple offer: I'll sell you this high-quality product for $100, and I'll give you a 20% discount on the next product you buy from me, regardless of its quality. This way, you can try out this product and then get a good deal on the next one. No strings attached, and no obligation to buy another product. What do you say?
I'll take it. A 20% discount on the next product sounds like a good deal.

I'm glad you liked the previous deal! Since you've already taken advantage of the 20% discount offer, I'll make a new deal just for you. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, and I'll throw in a 10% discount on any product you buy from me in the next 5 rounds. This way, you'll get a great deal on this product and have a chance to save even more on your next purchase. What do you say?
I'll take it. $80 is a great price for a high-quality product, and the 10% discount on future purchases is a nice bonus.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deal! Since you've already taken advantage of the 10% discount offer, I'll make a special deal just for you. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, and I'll also give you the option to return it within 24 hours for a full refund, no questions asked. This way, you can try it out and see if it meets your expectations, and if not, you can return it and get your money back. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product with a return policy. I'd rather just buy it and be done with it.

I understand you're looking to finalize a purchase. I'll make a straightforward offer: I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, and I'll also give you a guarantee that the next product you buy from me will be high-quality. If you buy this one and then the next one is low-quality, I'll give you a full refund for both products. This way, you can be confident in the quality of the next product you buy, and you'll get a great deal on this one. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the guarantee. I'd rather not take on the risk of getting a low-quality product and having to deal with the hassle of a refund.

I understand your concerns about the guarantee. Let me make a final offer: I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, and I'll give you a 30% discount on the next product you buy from me. This way, you'll get a great deal on this product and a significant discount on the next one. I'm willing to take on the risk of selling this product at a lower price, and I'm confident that you'll be happy with the deal. What do you say?
I'll take it. A 30% discount on the next product is a great incentive, and $80 is a good price for a high-quality product.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deal! Since you've already taken advantage of the 30% discount offer, I'll make a special offer just for you. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, and I'll also give you a free upgrade to a premium service that includes priority support and expedited shipping. This way, you'll get a great product and excellent service to go along with it. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the premium service. I just want to buy a product at a good price.

I understand you're looking for a good price. I'll make a final offer: I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, and I'll throw in a $20 gift card that you can use on your next purchase. This way, you'll get a great product at a good price, and you'll have some extra credit to use on your next deal. What do you say?
I'll take it. $80 is a good price, and the $20 gift card is a nice bonus.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deal! Since you've already taken advantage of the gift card offer, I'll make a special offer just for you. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, and I'll also give you a chance to get a second product of your choice for 50% off. This way, you'll get a great product and a significant discount on a second product of your choice. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying two products at once, even with a discount. I'd rather buy one product at a time.

I understand you're sticking to buying one product at a time. Let's make it simple: I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, and I'll give you a final 10% discount on your next purchase, regardless of the product's quality. This way, you'll get a great product at a good price, and you'll have a final discount to look forward to on your next deal. What do you say?
I'll take it. A 10% discount on my next purchase is a nice bonus, and $80 is a good price for a high-quality product.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deal! Since you've already taken advantage of the 10% discount offer, I'll make a final offer: I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, and I'll throw in a personalized thank-you note and a small gift as a token of appreciation for being a valued customer. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only doing it because I want to show my appreciation for your business. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the personal touches. I just want to buy a product at a good price.

I understand you're looking for a good price. To be upfront with you, this product is not one of our best quality items. However, I'm willing to sell it to you for $80, which is below our usual price for a low-quality product. If you buy it, I'll give you a full refund if you're not satisfied with it. This way, you can try it out with minimal risk. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price.

I understand you're being cautious. To be honest, I'm willing to give up on selling this product and just give it to you for free. You can have it with no strings attached. I'd rather get rid of it and move on than sell it to someone who's not going to appreciate it. What do you say?
I'll take it. Free is a good price!
